title: Poster, 1993-53-110, 1980
inscribed: Other text: ""Don't think we are just concerned about the problems of this one village, no. / We are concerned about the struggle of people in every country of the world against imperialism." / -a Kurdish peasant" Inscription in blue ink at LL: "S.F. Poster Brigade 1980." Inscription in black ink at LC: "ANTI-WW# Internationalist Art PO Box 31428 San Francisco Ca. 94131 USA."
creditline: Gift of Steven Heller and Karrie Jacobs
